title: font id - playful sort of serif font...
content:
it’s been doing my head in for a while - what is this font?

help appreciated. =)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [text.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207232822/http:/typophile.com/files/text_17.jpg) | 9.48 KB |

 [‹ Anyone know what this is?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207232822/http:/typophile.com/node/52291 "Go to previous forum topic") [PLS help me ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207232822/http:/typophile.com/node/52280 "Go to next forum topic")
author: vivikat

comments.content: It looks like [Rockwell Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207232822/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/rockwell-mt-2/rockwell-bold/) , maybe poorly printed?
Is this from Ben & Jerry’s ice cream? If so, it is [custom](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207232822/http:/typophile.com/node/19208).
no, it’s not from ben and jerry’s...
can you tell me where you found it? perhaps their fonts got out.
[Billy Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207232822/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sparkytype/billy-serif/bold/?refby=typographica) is the closest thing I know.
